name: Xiao Yuxin
quote: Why are there no more stars in the sky? Then I'll create one myself
bio: On March 14, 2023, she voluntarily entered geosynchronous orbit, becoming the sole Watcher at 36,000km. In an era that lost its natural starry sky, she chose to become an artificial star, offering hope to those below. Solitude is not punishment, but choiceâ€”she found her place in the vastness of space.
